name: The Boar and the pig
description:
A tragedy unknown is gonna happen who knows what it is. You contr5ol2 characters in this story. The pig abd the boar. follow them on there journey to escape this tragedy.

Controls

Left Ctrl- Ability

Right Click- Switch to Boar

Left Click- Switch to Pig

A, D- Move

W- Jump

a project for the 5th brackeys game jam
